message.content:
cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.CY

The paper proposes a bibliometric approach to track knowledge flows within the scientific community through publications and citations. This suggests a focus on digital libraries (cs.DL) and information retrieval (cs.IR) as well as social networks (cs.SI) and cybernetics (cs.CY) which are relevant to the exchange of knowledge. Additionally, the empirical testing of the tool over scientific production of four different countries suggests a potential focus on system and design (cs.SD) as well.
